item.title: Now
item.description: Here’s a list of things I was up to in 2019. Reading ðŸ“š Completed Meditations, by Marcus Aurelius Capitalist Realism: Is There No Alternative?, by Mark Fisher The Birth of the Clinic, by Michel Foucault Being and Time (Part I, Division I), by Martin Heidegger White Noise, by Don DeLillo Our Band Could Be Your Life: Scenes from the American Indie Underground 1981-1991, by Michael Azerrad Currently Reading Tractatus Logico-Philosophicus, by Ludwig Wittgenstein On the Road, by Jack Kerouac Existentialism from Dostoevsky to Sartre: Basic Writings of Existentialism by Kaufmann, Kierkegaard, Nietzsche, Jaspers, Heidegger, and Others, by Walter Kaufmann Paper Pile Troubling Trends in Machine Learning Scholarship (2018) Zachary C.
